translations: 对（货物）课以消费税；（手术）切除（器官、组织等）；（从文本、乐曲中）删去（某一部分）（excise 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Eating well and excising will help you grow.
sentences.translation: 吃好且多锻炼会帮助你健康成长。

sentences.sentence: Today i eat very well, because i go excising .
sentences.translation: 今天我吃的东西非常营养，因为我今天去锻炼了！

sentences.sentence: But excising all that code from Samba is a fairly major job.
sentences.translation: 但从samba除去所有这些代码是十分主要的工作。
